# Intro to R

In this part of book we will learn the basic of using R. If you already proficient with R you can skip this part of book and continue to other parts. In this part we will learn the following subject.

1.  Data Operation
2.  Data Manipulation
3.  Data Import
4.  Conditional Statement
5.  Loop
6.  Fucntion

Also there is other resource to help you learn R, ff you never use R, [Hands on Programming with R](https://rstudio-education.github.io/hopr/) is a good book to start. To download R you can go to CRAN (comprehensive R archive network) <https://cloud.r-project.org>. If you also have not download RStudio, you can download it from <https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/>, Rstudio itself is an integrated development environment, or IDE for progamming with R. Other book that i reccomended is [R for Data Scienece 2nd Edition](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/), this book will teach you many other R skill.
